episodes.original_body:
Case: Henrietta-Jenkins-MVA-5-20-2025
Client: Henrietta Jenkins

Completed comprehensive case folder reorganization. Moved 49 files from incorrectly numbered folders (1_Client, 2_Insurance, 3_Medical_Records, 5_Investigation, 7_Negotiation_Settlement) to correct 8-bucket structure. All files properly sorted by document type and provider. Medical records organized into Norton Audubon Hospital and Synergy Injury Care & Rehab Diagnostics subfolders with appropriate Medical Bills, Medical Records, and Medical Requests categorization. All numbered folders deleted after successful file migration.
episodes.natural_language:
Case: Henrietta-Jenkins-MVA-5-20-2025. Client: Henrietta Jenkins.

On May 20, 2025, a comprehensive reorganization of the Henrietta Jenkins case folder was completed. Forty-nine files were moved from incorrectly numbered folders—1_Client, 2_Insurance, 3_Medical_Records, 5_Investigation, and 7_Negotiation_Settlement—into the correct eight-bucket structure. All files were sorted by document type and provider.

In the medical records portion, files were organized into subfolders for Norton Audubon Hospital and Synergy Injury Care & Rehab Diagnostics, with each provider’s folder further categorized as Medical Bills, Medical Records, and Medical Requests.

Following successful migration, all of the numbered folders were deleted.
episodes.author: Roscoe (AI Paralegal)

episodes.original_body:
Case: Henrietta-Jenkins-MVA-5-20-2025
Client: Henrietta Jenkins

__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__ LMPD 25057018
Badge 4693

Was rear ended and pushed into the vehicle in front of her after leaving our office 

Went to Norton Audubon Hospital 

concussion, left side pain near ribs. 

PIP 
Root

BI
Progressive
Claim # 25-391686743 
__Person Making Contact:__ Justin
__Date & Time__: May 21 2025
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on May 21, 2025 with Justin regarding a motor vehicle accident involving client Henrietta Jenkins, case Henrietta-Jenkins-MVA-5-20-2025. The client is Henrietta Jenkins. On file are the following contact details: LMPD number 25057018 and badge 4693.

The incident occurred after she left our office when she was rear-ended and pushed into the vehicle in front of her. She subsequently went to Norton Audubon Hospital, reporting a concussion and left-sided pain near the ribs. The file indicates PIP coverage with Root and BI coverage with Progressive. The claim number is 25-391686743. The contact was made by Justin on May 21, 2025.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

about.relevance: client involved in the motor vehicle accident
treated client for concussion and left-sided rib pain

Client has herniated disc in her lumbar spine, and we have two prior MRI's, one only a few months prior that show no herniated disc. All the MRI's were done by Synergy and read by the same doctor. I'm sending that to the insurance company.
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on May 20, 2025, with Henrietta Jenkins regarding a motor vehicle accident. The client has a herniated disc in the lumbar spine.

There are two prior MRI studies; one was performed only a few months prior and showed no herniated disc. All MRIs were performed by Synergy and read by the same doctor. I am sending these MRI records to the insurance company.
episodes.author: Aaron

about.relevance: performed MRIs and provider of diagnostic records sent to insurer

In the New Demand Negotiation Note, during a call on November 3, the adjuster left a message; a separate call to the client was made but went unanswered. The case concerns Bodily Injury (BI) with Progressive Insurance Company. The note was written by Aaron Whaley and is filed under negotiations (#negotiations).
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

episodes.original_body:
Case: Henrietta-Jenkins-MVA-5-20-2025
Client: Henrietta Jenkins

The conversation was an update regarding Henrietta Jenkins' case, specifically about a first offer of $16,000 related to her injuries, including discussions about her medical records and potential future claims.
Recap
Aaron Whaley informed Henrietta Jenkins that the first offer for her case is $16,000, which includes $10,000 for medical bills.
Aaron discussed the findings from Henrietta's MRIs, noting that the most recent MRI showed significant changes, including herniated discs, which could impact her claim positively.
Aaron has sent the MRI records from previous accidents to the adjuster for review, hoping for a revised offer based on the new findings.
Henrietta mentioned that she returned to work a month ago but is still experiencing back pain, which she reported to Aaron during the call.
Tasks
Aaron Whaley will follow up with the adjuster regarding the review of Henrietta's MRI records and hopes to receive a new offer soon.
Henrietta will be available for further discussions after Wednesday, the 12th.
episodes.natural_language:
Case Henrietta-Jenkins-MVA-5-20-2025 involves client Henrietta Jenkins. The session was an update on Henrietta Jenkins' motor vehicle accident case, focusing on the first offer of $16,000 related to her injuries and including discussions about her medical records and potential future claims.

In the recap, Aaron Whaley informed Henrietta Jenkins that the initial offer for her case is $16,000, which includes $10,000 for medical bills. He discussed the findings from Henrietta's MRIs, noting that the most recent MRI showed significant changes, including herniated discs, which could positively impact her claim. He has sent the MRI records from previous accidents to the adjuster for review, hoping for a revised offer based on the new findings. Henrietta mentioned that she returned to work a month ago but is still experiencing back pain, which she reported to Aaron during the call.

For next steps, Aaron Whaley will follow up with the adjuster regarding the review of Henrietta's MRI records and hopes to receive a new offer soon. Henrietta will be available for further discussions after Wednesday, the 12th.
episodes.author: Aaron Whaley

about.relevance: communicated offer and will follow up with adjuster
